manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1080P 3000L High Brightness Movie Projector 100" Big Screen,3000:1 Contrast Ratio, 3W LED Life ciciglow portable projector uses a newly upgraded low-consumption LED light source, high-quality materials, and exquisite manufacturing technology. It supports 1920*1080P resolution and 3000:1 contrast ratio. The 100" large screen provides stunning projection images. Not only the ciciglow video projector protects your eyes, but the picture quality is also clearer and more delicate. It provides you engaging visual and auditory experience. Specifications: Physical Resolution: 480x360 Maximum Resolution: 1920x1080 Brightness: 40±3 ANSI Luminous Flux Maximum screen size: 100 inches LED Life: 30000 Hours Contrast: 3000:1 Trapezoid Correction: Manual

The Big Screen Will Bring You a Different and Wonderful Picture! The latest color calibration and adjustment technology of ciciglow projector can restore more complex color details,which increases the color contrast to 3000:1, which is for our customers provides real, dynamic, and colorful 1080P high-definition projection image quality.

Enjoy 100-inch giant screen theater without leaving the room! The projection screen is up to 100 inches, and the multiple adjustment modes of aspect ratio allow you to freely adjust the screen size and projection distance. The flexible installation method allows you freely choose according to your need. Let the ciciglow projector accompany you through every moment of leisure time!

Multiple Connection Methods, Wide Compatibility, So that You Have a Variety Of Choices! Equipped with multiple ports, including HDMI, USB, AV, and 3.5mm audio jack. ciciglow projector supports the connection with TV Stick,Earphone,USB disk,Games, Camera, Amplifier, Phone,Table,PC, Laptop.

Enjoy the Happy Time with ciciglow Projector! The ciciglow projector can accompany you and your friends through the happy time, you can watch a thrilling game competition with your brothers, spend a good night with your family, enjoy a sweet home theater with your lover. It must be the first choice for Christmas parties, family gatherings, leisure and entertainment, and small meetings. Take it home or give it as a Christmas gift to family and friends.
What's in the box 1 x Mini Projector1 x Power Adapter1 x AV Cable1 x Remote Control1 x User Manual Note: Remote control shipped without batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Picture is pixely
reviews.reviewText: The picture quality is not that great. It is Pixley and reminds me of and eight bit game so I would not say that this is high definition. For the price I didn’t really expect Much.
